mapper.select: select * from ( select p.project_no , p.project_thum , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , p.project_count from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no and p.project_status = 3 and ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) > 0 group by p.project_no , p.project_title , p.project_thum , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , p.project_count order by p.project_count desc)

select * from ( select p.project_no , p.project_thum , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , p.project_count from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no and p.project_status = 3 and ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) > 0
group by p.project_no , p.project_title , p.project_thum , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , p.project_count having floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) > 90 and floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) < 100 order by floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) desc)

select * from ( select p.project_no , p.project_thum , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , p.project_count from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no and p.project_status = 1 and ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) > 0 group by p.project_no , p.project_title , p.project_thum , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , p.project_count )

select p.project_no , p.project_thum , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no and p.project_status = 3
and hashtag
and partner_name
and project_title
and project_summery
like '%' || #{ keyword } || '%' group by p.project_no , p.project_title , p.project_thum , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt order by p.project_no desc
select cat_no , cat_name , cat_file from category

select p.project_no , p.project_thum , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no and p.project_status = 3 group by p.project_no , p.project_title , p.project_thum , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt order by p.project_no desc

select p.project_no , p.project_thum , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no and p.project_status = 3 and c.cat_no = #{catNo} group by p.project_no , p.project_title , p.project_thum , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_start_dt , p.project_end_dt order by p.project_no desc
mapper.update: update project set project_count = project_count+1 where project_no = #{projectNo}
mapper.select: select cat_no , cat_name , project_no , project_title , project_thum , (select sum(total_price) from tb_order where project_no = #{projectNo}) total_price , project_gprice , (select (select sum(total_price) from tb_order where project_no = #{projectNo}) / project_gprice * 100 from project where project_no = #{projectNo}) percentage , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , (select count(*) from tb_order where project_no = #{projectNo}) supporter , project_end_dt , to_char(project_end_dt + 1, 'MM"월" DD"일"') pay_date , delivery_date , project_content , project_refcon , hashtag , member_no , partner_name , partner_intro , member_profile , partner_phone , partner_email , phone_yn from project join member using(member_no) join category using(cat_no) where project_no = #{projectNo}
select reward_no , reward_price , reward_stock , reward_title , reward_content , option_yn from reward where project_no = #{projectNo}

select project_title , reward_no , reward_title , reward_price , reward_stock , delivery_date , reward_ship , reward_content , option_yn from reward join project using(project_no) where project_no = #{projectNo}
select reward_title , reward_price , reward_content from reward where reward_no = #{rewardNo}

select r.reply_no , reply_content , to_char(reply_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') reply_date , reply_status , project_no , m.member_no , m.member_name , m.member_profile , s.subre_content , to_char(s.subre_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') subre_date from pro_reply r join member m on(m.member_no=r.member_no) left join sub_reply s on(s.reply_no=r.reply_no) where reply_status = '1' and project_no = #{pno} order by reply_no desc
select count(*) from project

select p.project_no , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , to_char(p.project_end_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , p.project_status , (select count(*) from likey l where l.project_no = p.project_no) as likeCount from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no group by p.project_no , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_end_dt , p.project_status order by p.project_no desc

select cat_no , cat_name , project_no , project_title , project_thum , (select sum(total_price) from tb_order where project_no = #{pno}) total_price , project_gprice , (select (select sum(total_price) from tb_order where project_no = #{pno}) / project_gprice * 100 from project where project_no = #{pno}) percentage , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , (select count(*) from tb_order where project_no = #{pno}) supporter , project_end_dt , to_char(project_end_dt + 1, 'MM"월" DD"일"') pay_date , delivery_date , project_content , project_refcon , hashtag , member_no , partner_name , partner_intro , member_profile , partner_phone , partner_email , phone_yn , project_status from project join member using(member_no) join category using(cat_no) where project_no = #{pno}
select m.member_profile , m.partner_name , m.partner_intro from member m join project p on(p.member_no = m.member_no) where p.project_no = #{pno}

select project_title , reward_no , reward_title , reward_price , reward_stock , delivery_date , reward_ship , reward_content , option_yn from reward join project using(project_no) where project_no = #{pno}
select count(*) from project where project_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select p.project_no , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , sum(o.total_price) total_price , floor(sum(o.total_price) / p.project_gprice * 100) percentage , p.project_gprice , to_char(p.project_end_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') project_end_dt , ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) dday , p.project_status , (select count(*) from likey l where l.project_no = p.project_no ) as likeCount from tb_order o , project p , category c , member m where p.project_title like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) >= 0 and 0 > ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate)
and ceil(project_end_dt - sysdate) >= 0
and p.project_no = o.project_no(+) and p.cat_no = c.cat_no and p.member_no = m.member_no group by p.project_no , p.project_title , c.cat_no , c.cat_name , m.partner_name , p.project_gprice , p.project_end_dt , p.project_status , p.project_cr_dt order by
p.project_cr_dt desc
, p.project_cr_dt desc , dday asc , likeCount desc
